An2-ne lah, ah chong5-a2 kap i khi3. Sou2-i2 e5 si5 nia5, i chong5-a2 khi3 kau3 hia, i chit e5 cha-bou2, sou2-u7 e5 ia7 u7 in ang pang3 e5 hit e5 san2-giap8, i chiah lai5 ka7 i koan2-li2, ah chiah nng7 e5 tiam3 hia, chiah loh8 khi3 kiat-hun, ah loh8 khi3 senn ah, honn3, keng-long5, an2-ne chong5-a2 tou7 i e5 it-seng an2-ne keng-koe3.

啊到甲的時爾，彼陣仔呼，生子了，呼，啊某的時chong5仔講：「Hm3，安呢無來去廟寺呼，來去彼燒一下金咧，呼，來拜拜咧，囝仔做度晬。」安呢就翁仔某招咧去，咱這種號做的時爾，佛靈寺，去彼得燒金，呼。啊當一下佛靈寺啊，抱嬰仔去彼佇得燒金的時陣爾，想講來到廟宇啊，添一下油香啦，呼，無卜那會用e5啦。抵仔卜提去添油香的時爾爾，抵抵仔好彼个時啊，咱這个號做和尚，這个道僧啊，伊抵仔好佇彼，佇彼間廟裡啊，內底的主持啊，呼。啊伊抵仔囝仔抱咧：「Oeh，原來就是你啊！」伊講：「Henn7啊！啊安若，做老父啊呼？哦啊擱有一个家後安呢成好，阿彌陀佛哦。」安呢哦，伊講：「哎喲！師父啊！我愛大大共你感謝。若無你共我提醒，我這條命已經死了啊，呼。今仔你的恩德，呼，攏歸个是咱這種號做佛祖，呼，伊的靈感，啊來派你來共我指示，我才有今仔日的時安爾佇得安居樂業。」呼，來哦，叫某講：「較緊咧！油香加添一寡啦，較予這香煙呼，較旺盛咧哦！」

Ah kau3 kah e5 si5 nia5, hit-cham7-a2 honn3, senn kiann2 liau2, honn3, ah in bou2 e5 si5 chong5-a2 kong2: “Hm3, an2-ne bo5 lai5 khi3 bio7-si7 honn3, lai5 khi3 hia sio chit8-e7 kim leh, honn3, lai5 pai3-pai3 leh, gin2-a2 cho3 tou7-che3.” An2-ne to7 ang-a2-bou2 chio leh khi3, lan2 chit chiong2 ho7-cho3 e5 si5 nia5, Put8-leng5-si7, khi3 hia teh sio-kim, honn3. Ah tann chit8-e7 Put8-leng5-si7 ah, pho7 inn-a2 khi3 hia ti7 teh sio-kim e5 si5-chun7 nia5, siunn7 kong2 lai5 kau3 bio7-u2 ah, thiam chit8-e7 iu5-hiunn lah, honn3, bo5 beh nah e7-eng7--e5 lah. Tu2-a2 beh theh8 khi3 thiam-iu5-hiunn e5 si5 nia7-nia7, tu2-tu2-a2-ho2 hit e5 si5 ah, lan2 chit e5 ho7-cho3 hoe5-siunn7, chit e5 to7-cheng ah, i tu2-a2-ho2 ti7 hia, ti7 hit keng bio7--nih ah, lai7-te2 e5 chu2-chhi5 ah, honn3. Ah i tu2-a2 gin2-a2 pho7 leh: “Oeh, goan5-lai5 to7 si7 li2 ah!” I kong2: “Henn7 ah! Ah an2-noa2, cho3 lau7-pe7 ah honn3? Ou5 ah koh u7 chit8 e5 ke-au7 an2-ne chiann5 ho2, a-mi-to5-hut8 ouh.” An2-ne ouh, i kong2: “Aih-ioh! Su-hu7 ah! Goa2 ai3 toa7-toa7 ka7 li2 kam2-sia7. Na7 bo5 li2 ka7 goa2 the5-chhenn2, goa2 chit tiau5 mia7 i2-keng si2 liau2 ah, honn3. Kin-a2 li2 e5 un-tek, honn3, long2 kui-e5 si7 lan2 chit chiong2 ho7-cho3 put8-chou2, honn3, i e5 leng5-kam2, ah lai5 phai3 li2 lai5 ka7 goa2 chi2-si7, goa2 chiah u7 kin-a2-jit8 e5 si5 an2-ne ti7 teh an-ki-lok8-giap8.” Honn3, lai5 ouh, kio3 in bou2 kong2: “Khah kin2 leh! Iu5-hiunn ke thinn chit8-koa2 lah, khah hou7 che hiunn-ian honn3, khah ong7-seng7 leh ouh!”
